Name: Frank Sullivan Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Blanc quinquina/kina (e.g. Mattei Cap Corse, Bonal or Kina L'Aér
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
RIM glass with sugar (moisten the outside edge with orange juice and dip into sugar).
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: If you like Sidecars , then you'll love the Frank Sullivan. Just on the tart side with a touch of quinine bitterness which makes sipping through a sugar-crusted rim a delight.
History: Adapted from the Frank Sullivan Cocktail recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book . The same book also features two other cocktails with the exact same recipe: the Hoop La! Cocktail and Odd McIntyre Cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Frank Sullivan Cocktail contains 159 calories
